channel.title: RSPS HELP - Mac OS X
channel.description:
Hello. I have recently been coding on my Mac. I copied my server files from Win7 laptop to Mac laptop. I know that macs dont have .bat and someone told me I had to change .bat to .sh
I did that and tried opening it, and it opens with TextEdit. How can i make it so I can run and compile on my Max? I run Mac OS X
Please help, and thanks in advance :)

item.title: RSPS HELP - Mac OS X
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Pm me, im a mac i can help

Read full topic
